description: 本課程主要藉由主題人物探討全球教育創新議題,透過「創新分組」與「學習型團隊」,提升學生的創新協作能力,並在學期中和學期末以「語言劇場」同步引導英文程度不同的學生合作學習。課程將融入優質對話的體驗學習,整學期學生將在英文演說、敘說、說故事、簡報或新聞報導的學習,以「同步聽說」法和「全像多維」學習法不斷演練,從各自不同的程度快速提升英文聽說讀寫的整合運用能力。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
The main goal of this course is to enhance non-English majors’ English abilities to adequately comprehend and properly convey ideas on education through exposure to authentic materials (such as TED Talks, videos from YouTube, and newspaper articles, etc.) and performing communicative language tasks (such as discussion, response writing, and oral presentation). The course is organized around four themes related to education. Based on the materials provided, students will reflect upon their own educational experiences, probe for answers to questions raised by the teacher or themselves, and articulate their thoughts about teaching, learning, and schooling. Students are expected to learn education-related English and broaden their knowledge and views about education at the same time.
